Reviews.Content: best location I stay in this hotel every time i go to Hong Kong. Service is great and the rooms are very comfortable. You get complimentary water too but you have to pay a steep price for internet. Its connected to Ocean Terminal which is a huge shopping area that connects the other Marco Polo hotels. It's a 3 minute walk towards the MTR on Nathan road. Since it is near the Harbor, its a 10minute walk to get there and you can ride the ferry towards Hong Kong Island (it's the more scenic route).
Reviews.Author: maha86

Reviews.Content: Excellent Service, best location There are three Macro Polo Hotels in Canton Road. I stayed in Macro Polo Prince before. I preferred Macro Polo Gateway. Gateway is located in the middle and it has the best location. It is only within 5-minutes walking distance to the Tsim Sha Tsui MTR (subway) station.
